title: Viva Zapata
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Typical tapas bar/restaurant located at the beginning of the alternative Mainzer Strasse when coming from the main shopping street Bahnhofstrasse. Menu is in German only. Bread and baguette accompanying the tapas are vegan. Vegan dips include guacamole and salsa. Vegan tapas include the Catalan spinach, pimientos de padr√≥n (bell pepper), chickpeas with spinach, patatas bravas (seasoned wild potatoes), and a couple others. For salads, ask for vegan dressing. Good atmosphere.
